text:
where `make_n` is just
```function make_n(comp, N, names)
    R = rand(N)
    V = 1.0
    systems = []
    for i in eachindex(R)
        sys = eval(:($comp(;name=$names[$i], R=$R[$i])))
        push!(systems, sys)
    end 
    systems
end    ```

elements.text:
function make_n(comp, N, names)
    R = rand(N)
    V = 1.0
    systems = []
    for i in eachindex(R)
        sys = eval(:($comp(;name=$names[$i], R=$R[$i])))
        push!(systems, sys)
    end 
    systems
end
